name: Ext_R5_DocumentReference_subject
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.DocumentReference.subject for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents DocumentReference.subject from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/DocumentReference|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Who/what is the subject of the document
element.definition: Who or what the document is about. The document can be about a person, (patient or healthcare practitioner), a device (e.g. a machine) or even a group of subjects (such as a document about a herd of farm animals, or a set of patients that share a common exposure).
element.comment: `DocumentReference.subject` maps to R4B `DocumentReference.subject`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget. `DocumentReference.subject` maps to R4B `Media.subject`. Has no type mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
